body:
Hello Avicus.

With the new Junior Moderators coming in, I am hosting a survey for the community to post their honest, anonymous feedback on our staff team.

We did a survey like this a while ago, and it worked out quite well.

Feedback helps us improve very much, so I would love to hear your opinions on our current moderation team.

General Rules:
  • Don't submit troll/joke feedback, be serious.
  • While this is anonymous, I encourage constructive criticism, try not to be excessively rude/disrespectful in your feedback.
  • This survey is meant for the moderation team only, which is Junior Mod to Senior Mod, only moderator feedback.
I will most likely bring this feedback up in a staff meeting, or to the mods mentioned, however, troll feedback and excessively rude feedback WILL be removed.

I look forward to hearing your feedback, and seeing the way our team can improve.

This survey is completely anonymous, your IP address or username are not collected in any way.
Survey Link: https://avicoresurvey.typeform.com/to/nvfxTT

title: Avicus Moderator Survey

replies.body: I didn't create the survey, but I forwarded the idea.
replies.body_tagged: I didn't create the survey, but I forwarded the idea.

replies.body: Please, finish off the survey so we can observe the results.
replies.body_tagged: Please, finish off the survey so we can observe the results.

replies.body: I know, Thanks for the idea! :D
replies.body_tagged: I know, Thanks for the idea! :D

reply_to.body_tagged: I didn't create the survey, but I forwarded the idea.

replies.body: No, it is completely public and your answers will be broadcast on televisions everywhere and in the middle of Times Square. (It's anonymous.)
replies.body_tagged: No, it is completely public and your answers will be broadcast on televisions everywhere and in the middle of Times Square. (It's anonymous.)

replies.body:
Oops I accidentally mentioned a Manager :/

And why is there only one question?
replies.body_tagged:
Oops I accidentally mentioned a Manager :/

And why is there only one question?

replies.body: There doesn't really need to be multiple questions, one question about feedback is good enough.
replies.body_tagged: There doesn't really need to be multiple questions, one question about feedback is good enough.

replies.body: Just a reminder that it's ok to leave feedback on the staff team as a whole, but feedback directed at certain individual(s) is most helpful.

replies.body: So say what Mod you like/hate? ._.

reply_to.body: So say what Mod you like/hate? ._.

replies.body:
All Mods are very good at moderating.
The junior mods also don't abuse their powers
So Overall,
I like the good choices of mods!

Lawrence.

replies.body: Lawrence you were suppose to post that on the survey :c and it was supposed to be anonymous

replies.body:
Feedback will be closed when 55-60 responses are received, thank you for your feedback.

Currently, there are 45 responses.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Thanks guys, all the feedback helps to make the staff team better.
replies.body_tagged: Thanks guys, all the feedback helps to make the staff team better.

replies.body: Thank you for adding this. I feel that this will help the mods imrpove.
replies.body_tagged: Thank you for adding this. I feel that this will help the mods imrpove.

replies.body:
We have reached our goal of responses.

Thank you for your feedback, us as a staff team will see how we can improve.
